CustomField.formula: IF(SBQQ__RequiredBy__c = "", "Body Length: " & Body_Length__c & BR() & "Floor Thickness & Material: " & Floor_Thickness_Material__c & BR() & "Side Information: " & TEXT(Side_Height__c) & "High with " &Side_Material__c & " " & TEXT(Side_Thickness__c) & " Thickness" & BR() & "High Lift Tailgate" & BR() & "Transmission: " & TEXT(Transmission__c) & BR() & "Paint Color: " & TEXT(Body_Color__c ), "")
CustomField.label: Ext Description Formula
